Description: Discover the future of cancer diagnostics and learn from leading experts on how 3D genomics is setting a new standard in cancer diagnostics, from genomic analysis to clinical applications. Hear from guest speaker Feng Yue, who will describe the application of Arima technology in glioblastoma research, demonstrating its broad utility in cancer studies. Dive into the technical foundations and its implications for the future of cancer research with Arima SVP of Science Anthony Schmitt. Lastly, learn how Arima's clinical testing service, through our partnership with Aventa Genomics, is pioneering the way for more accessible and precise cancer diagnostics.
Location: Spotlight Theater E - Sails Pavilion - Conv Ctr
SearchResultBody: ESP3E. From Genomic Insights to Clinical Solutions: The Role of 3D Genomics in Cancer Research and Diagnostics
SearchResultFooter: Spotlight Theater E - Sails Pavilion - Conv Ctr
Title: From Genomic Insights to Clinical Solutions: The Role of 3D Genomics in Cancer Research and Diagnostics
